author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: و در مقام دیگر میفرماید: "یا معشر الأمرآء لیس فی العالم جند اقوی من العدل و العقل..."
translation: of the rulers of the world! There is no force on earth that can equal in its conquering power the force of justice and wisdom.… Blessed is the king who marcheth with the ensign of wisdom unfurled before him, and the battalions of justice massed in his rear.
